Adhering to the principles of [[Iaidō]], the user performs a quick and powerful slash with their sword in order to cut the intended target, before immediately re-sheathing the blade afterwards.

When used by Mifune, the technique was strong enough to cleanly slice open the large head of [[Hanzō]]'s salamander, [[Ibuse]].

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3]]'', Mifune exclaims something similar to this technique's name when performing a [[Dancing Blade Risk|differently named technique]], which also has a different motion from this technique.
